message.body: The ad sheet just went out to every business on church st for which i could find an email address. Bluebird has a donation request section on their website, i filled that out too
You're a good man, Charlie Brown!
And i just made a giant list of other businesses, im asking jenna to help me collect all the email addresses

LocalvoreToday got in touch about ad space, and i suggested a barter since i was hoping to promote through them also, he wants to meet for coffee next week, would you rather meet with him? Or is it ok for me to take this on?
